title: AppleOskar
author: AppleOskar
created_time: May 29, 2022, 12:10:30 PMLast edit: May 29, 2022, 12:21:58 PM by AppleOskar
content: Let's talk about Chives (ENG) | Дaвaйтe пoгoвopимo пpo Chives (UA) | Дaвaйтe пoгoвopим o Chives (RU)Chives was released on June 30th, 2021 and the binary file for mining was released on July 5th, 2021.Chives is a hard fork of Chia, with support for k29, k30, k31 rafts, created by community volunteers using the Chia coin code. Blockchain project without preliminary mining and ICO.At the moment, the coin is traded on one Lbank exchange, which is included in the TOP 25 exchanges according to the Coinmarketcap service and its price is $0.003. A month ago, the team announced a new listing on a new exchange this summer.Now the project has 9 pools and a network size of more than 200 PB.More information at the link below:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5400398.0Active community in discord:https://discord.gg/TbWT3ka3kv

comments.author: AppleOskar
comments.body: Master Node Updates! 100K XCC will be the staking quantity requirement when the Master Node first launches.

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.created_time: June 03, 2022, 11:51:21 PMLast edit: June 05, 2022, 09:30:54 PM by Kavelj22
comments.body: I don't see a dedicated website for the project.If the token was already listed then you should be ready to go with promotion and Marketing. What's your strategy for that?Despite the solidity of the project and the team with good technical knowledge in the field, it does not really rise to be a real investment project that can be relied upon to earn profits according to the current market conditions.

comments.author: blue Snow
comments.body: Quote from: AppleOskar on June 03, 2022, 11:10:34 PMMaster Node Updates! 100K XCC will be the staking quantity requirement when the Master Node first launches. You must be concerned about where you have focused to post, in the same time you did post it on Announcements (Altcoins) in another time you did also here.As the post above, what is your concern?. So, I look for how it works, in your site I can't find how to mine and get the token. I don't know whether mining activity is begin or not, as I can see, your token is no premine and no ico like another coin pos did.
